item.title: Why There's Nothing Here (Yet)
item.description: To be honest, I’m focusing my writing nowadays on my upcoming book: Hacking the Home Assignment, a guide for Junior Developers who want a better shot at passing the new age of technical interviews. In the past I’ve written all over the place, in Medium, in our company’s internal blog, and even a personal blog. Hopefully in the future I’ll find content worthy of this blog’s pages, and not only as part of the book.
